subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Amani Toomer and Michael Strahan have built a unique friendship and bonded tighter than ever during this playoff run, which leads to Green Bay on Sunday for the N.F.C. championship game.
snippet: Amani Toomer and Michael Strahan have built a unique friendship and bonded tighter than ever during this playoff run, which leads to Green Bay on Sunday for the N.F.C. championship game.
